original_text: And the priests waited on their offices: the Levites also with instruments of musick of the Lord, which David the king had made to praise the Lord, because his mercy endureth for ever, when David praised by their ministry; and the priests sounded trumpets before them, and all Israel stood.
korean_text: 그 때에 제사장들은 직분대로 모셔 서고 레위 사람도 여호와의 악기를 가지고 섰으니 이 악기는 전에 다윗이 레위 사람들에게 여호와께 감사하게 하려고 만들어서 여호와의 인자하심이 영원함을 찬송하게 하던 것이라 제사장들은 무리 앞에서 나팔을 불고 온 이스라엘은 서 있더라

sentences.original_text: And the priests waited on their offices
the Levites also with instruments of musick of the Lord
which David the king had made to praise the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗 왕이 주를 찬송하기 위해 만든 것으로

sentences.original_text: because his mercy endureth for ever
when David praised by their ministry
and the priests sounded trumpets before them
